metadata.notes: These settings illustrate common award treatments for annual leave loading.

default.note: Default guidance – leave loading is treated as OTE and subject to payroll tax unless an award carve-out applies.

rules.note: Clerks – Private Sector Award clause 25 treats the 17.5% loading as part of ordinary time earnings.
Legacy workplace agreement specifies the loading is an ex gratia payment.
Queensland state instrument treats the loading as not OTE but super guarantee still applies.
